CustomField.description: Tells the system to persist the latest exchange rate in the database whenever the API is queried. Creates a row for each Base + Quote combination when fetching the latest data.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Tells the system to persist the latest exchange rate in the database whenever the API is queried. Creates a row for each Base + Quote combination when fetching the latest data.
CustomField.label: Persist Latest Exchange Rates
